problem.markdown: >>Which of the following are true about hydroelectric dams?<< Choose the THREE characteristics that apply. [x] they contribute to evapotranspiration around the dam [x] hydroelectric dams provide recreation from water impounded behind the dam [ ] they have almost no impact on the regional environment [ ] they promote natural ecosystems [x] they use a non-depletable resource to generate electricity [explanation] Hydroelectric dams lead to increased evapotranspiration and they use a non-depletable resource (water). They do create recreational opportunities in the impounded water area. They do not promote natural ecosystems and they do have an impact on the regional environment. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following are true about hydroelectric dams? Choose the THREE characteristics that apply.
